alert.note: Alert for Eastern Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 2:17AM EST until February 13 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: .Low pressure tracking along the Carolina Coastline will produce widespread precipitation in the central and southern Appalachians. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations less than one inch and ice accumulations less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Eastern Tucker County. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence is low for this event as the northern edge of the precipitation shield will be encountering significant amounts of dry air. This may prevent the precipitation from reaching the ground as far north as Tucker County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
